title: Mcgraw Portrait Piedmont and Glove Polar Bear - SGC 4s
author: bounce

posts.post_title: Mcgraw Portrait Piedmont and Glove Polar Bear - SGC 4s
posts.post_content:
Prices are net to me and delivered to keep it simple.

I potentially will listen to trade offers, but it must be HOFers only as that is all I collect now.

DMs or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]


John McGraw portrait Piedmont 150 SGC 4 - $425 DLVD
Nice mid-grade, rounded corners are the primary reason for the grade.

John McGraw glove at hip Polar Bear SGC 4 - $650 DLVD - PENDING
A PSA 4 sold for $726 in October, and if you check the pop report on PSA the Polar Bear back on this is actually tougher than American Beauty - bet you wouldn't have guessed that!
